fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 40.15 points or 0.21% to settle at 18,856.85. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 1.43% to 11.29. HDFC Bank, Piramal Enterprises, Shriram Finance were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
